sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Box, Button } from 'react-bulma-components'; function Search() { const { Input, Field, Control, Label, Select } = Form const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ tags: "", sort: "pop", releaseType: "all", depth: "1" }) const handleInput = (e) => { const keyName = e.target.name const keyVal = e.target.value setInputs(prev => ({...prev, [keyName]: keyVal})) } const sendSearchQuery = () => { for (key in inputs) { console.log(key) } } return (

Genres: {inputs.tags}

Sort: {inputs.sort}

Release: {inputs.releaseType}

Depth: {inputs.depth}

{/* Genres field */} {} {/* Depth field */} {/* Sort field */} {/* Type field */} {/* Submit field */}
) } export default Search
